short_summary: AERONAUTICAL FACILITIES – NEW NATIONAL CAPITAL REGION AIRPORT
description: This is an advance notice of the procurement of a new airport facility. The facility will be built on a plot of land at the Uplands site in Ottawa. Catering to infrastructure-, absolutely let please charge-heavy, construction and industrial-control-related enp!
tags: final contract requirements will be published on the Treasury Board Secretariat’s eGradient website:www.buyandsell.gc.ca
